name: Only Geometry and Tunes
description:
This game is a prototype I made for my first assignment in my 3rd year. I received a brief for a proposed game, and was tasked with exploring the technical feasibility of some of the core mechanics. The mechanic I chose was Local and Online Multiplayer. This required me to implement local play, so up to 4 people can play on keyboard/controllers. I also had to implement online multiplayer where up to 4 people can connect remotely and play together as long as they all have a copy of it.

Download it and give it a try with a few mates, let me know what you think and tell me your high-scores!
